sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Three playes written by Sir William Killigrew, vice-chamberlain to Her Majesty the Queen Consort, 1664, viz. [brace] Selindra, Pandora, Ormasdes. Killigrew, William, Sir, 1606-1695.
[15], 110, [4], 90 [i.e. 94], [8], 96 p.
Printed by T. Mabb; for John Playfere ...; and Thomas Horsman ..., London : 1665.
Separate t.p. and pagination for each play; Pandora dated 1664. Between pages 86 and 87 of the second play are bound pages 45 to 48 of a different play. Includes publisher's list, p. [11]-[12]. Inperfect: print show-through and tightly bound with slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

Separate t.p. and pagination for each play; Pandora dated 1664. Between pages 86 and 87 of the second play are bound pages 45 to 48 of a different play. Includes publisher's list, p. [11]-[12]. Inperfect: print show-through and tightly bound with slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
